msbt.message: Man, what happened the other day, ?I went to your place a buncha times! But you weren't there.Did you forget about our plans to hang out?!
I know I promised to come over to your place, but, um, something came up and now I can't!Sorry! I'll definitely make it the next time you invite me, !
Sorry, ! I said I'd come over the other day, but my brain totally forgot!I feel real bad.I promise I won't forget the next time you invite me!
